name: Downhill (BennetDoesGames)
description:
Mostly a walking simulator made in RPG Maker that started off as a joke to help deal with depression. May not help deal with depression.

Downhill uses music composed by DisOmikron. Check him out:
https://www.youtube.com/user/DisOmikron

Additional map design by callmecrashy:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKgBgCrpxZzwaLmoujhQ6ow
